channel.title: Top Stories,Andhra Pradesh,News,State on NewsStreet | News portal
channel.description: Recent content in Top Stories,Andhra Pradesh,News,State on NewsStreet | News portal

item.title: AP High Court reserves the verdict on Amaravati farmers Maha Padayatra
item.description: AP High Court reserves the verdict on Amaravati farmers Maha Padayatra The hearing in the High Court on the petitions filed in connection with the Amaravati Farmers' Maha Padayatra has ended.

item.title: RGV announces a movie on politics just after meeting YS Jagan
item.description: RGV announces a movie on politics just after meeting YS Jagan The maverick director Ram Gopal Varma who met Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister YS Jagan Mohan Reddy on Wednesday has plunged into action to make a movie on the political drama.

item.title: AP govt. makes changes to Jagananna Gorumudda regarding distribution of eggs
item.description: AP govt. makes changes to Jagananna Gorumudda regarding distribution of eggs It is known that the government of Andhra Pradesh is giving importance to the quality of nutritious food provided to students studying in schools andonitoring the scheme from time to time and making necessary changes.

item.title: Tirumala temple to remain closed tomorrow due to Solar ecclipse
item.description: Tirumala temple to remain closed tomorrow due to Solar ecclipse The Tirumala Tirupati Devasthanam announced that Tirumala temple will be closed on Tuesday from 8 am to 7.
